text: tavada ‘allah pahala karana mema (dharmaya) anugamanaya karanu’ yayi ovunta kiyanu læbuvahot (ovun) “ese nova, kumak mata apage mutun mittan (sitimin, ovun kumak karamin) sitinu api dutuvemuda, eyama api anugamanaya karannemu” yayi pavasannaha. ovunge mutun mittan kisivak nodanna aya vasayenda, rju margaya at nokara gat aya vasayenda sitiyat vuvada, (ovunva anugamanaya karannehuda)
